Author: phideas#8309
Content: After a little bit of struggle to create a wallet (slow encryption, freezing ui) I am happy to swap back and forth on mobile. Dozen of swaps, no failure so far. Native Android UX very slick. It's gonna need o lot of tweak and polish to make it production ready, but overall I am impressed.

Author: phideas#8309
Content: I think currently the best UX on Android belongs to Exodus Wallet. Definitely recommend to check that out. With a little effort Atomic Dex could get pretty close to that.

Author: ca333#0118
Content: Thanks for the feedback @phideas - towards end of beta stage our main focus will be UX/UI enhancement (charts, improved UX,...).

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: @phideas exodus mobile is a beaut
